Description:
We’ve removed the last\_active field from the organization user export report. This field has been removed to improve data quality as it was not providing the level of accuracy needed…

The post [last_active field removed from the organization members export report](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-09-14-last_active-field-removed-from-the-organization-members-export-report) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
EnhancedContent: We’ve removed the `last_active` field from the organization user export report. This field has been removed to improve data quality as it was not providing the level of accuracy needed for effective user activity monitoring. Enterprise admins can continue to use the enterprise dormancy report for reliable user activity insights.
Author: Allison
Title: last_active field removed from the organization members export report
